name: 80'S OVERDRIVE
description:
80'S OVERDRIVE is a 2D pixel art racing game, designed to take you back
in time to when 8 and 16 bit consoles and arcade games ruled the world.
Compete against opponents in career mode to unlock new races, buy new
cars, and upgrade them with state-of-the-art technologies! Try your
skill in time attack mode and see how far you can get in this race
against the clock! Create your own tracks with built-in track generator
and easily share them with your friends!

Features:

2 game modes and racing track editor;

6 retro supercars;

8 unique visual themes;

13 synth/retrowave music scores;

tons of retro, handcrafted, pixel-perfect joy!
